backend/main.mo: Actor providing access control initialization and queries plus large in‑memory maps for user profiles, posts, comments, messaging, live sessions, blogs, marketplace posts, albums, and achievement data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend React components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting metadata, favicon, root mount node, and loading the React entry script.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app name, theme colors, start URL, and app icons.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing navigation caching, asset caching, versioned cache management, and network‑first strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with router setup, providers, service‑worker recovery, global layout, and routes for all major screens including the All‑in‑One Hub.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard that checks admin status and shows management tabs like service status and storage cleanup.
frontend/src/components/AllInOneHub.tsx: Central navigation hub displaying main app sections and actions with auth-gated options and a create-post modal.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedDeedsBar: Animated canvas-based progress bar that shows session and daily usage limits with warnings and timeouts.
frontend/src/components/BlogCard.tsx: Renders an individual blog card with author info, media badges, truncated content, and profile modal support.
frontend/src/components/BlogPage.tsx: Blog listing page that loads, sorts, and displays blogs with a create-blog modal and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/ChallengesSectio: Challenge system UI with weekly challenges, joining, sharing, leaderboards, badges, and progress dialogs.
Renders a comment form and list with sorting, loading states, and user profile lookups; submission is stubbed with a placeholder toast.
frontend/src/components/CreateBlogButton: Shows a button that opens a modal for creating a blog post.
Modal for creating a blog with text, categories, tags, media upload previews, and form validation before calling the createBlog mutation.
frontend/src/components/CreateMarketplac: Modal to create a marketplace post with required fields, category and type selection, optional media upload, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/components/CreatePostButton: Displays a stylized button that opens the CreatePostModal for sharing a new post.
Modal for creating a post with caption, category, optional photo or video upload, filters, and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/DeedsBar.tsx: Displays session and daily usage timers with battery-style indicators and triggers warnings or timeout callbacks.
frontend/src/components/DiscoverFeed.tsx: Displays a discover page with filterable post feed and video mode, fetching and sorting posts based on selected criteria.
frontend/src/components/Feed.tsx: Renders the main feed with filters for content types, sorting posts by timestamp, and supports a video-only viewing mode.
frontend/src/components/FollowersModal.t: Shows a modal listing a user's followers with profile previews, loading states, and scrollable content.
frontend/src/components/FollowingModal.t: Shows a modal listing accounts the user follows with profile details and loading handling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FriendsStatusFee: Displays recent status updates from followed users with timestamps, loading skeletons, and empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/Gate.tsx: Landing page combining search, trending blogs, challenges, friend status feed, and introductory content for the app.
frontend/src/components/GradeDeedsRating: Displays a detailed rating card with mock data and allows authenticated friends to submit ratings via a modal.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header bar handling login/logout, navigation, language selection, and optional messages button.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Provides a dialog-based language picker allowing users to switch among predefined languages.
frontend/src/components/LiveChatPanel.ts: Live chat interface that loads comments, auto-scrolls, and lets users post new messages; includes comment item rendering.
frontend/src/components/LiveFeed.tsx: Lists active live sessions, supports starting a new session, and opens viewer modals for selected streams.
Modal viewer showing a placeholder live stream with viewer count and an embedded live chat panel.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Login screen that triggers Internet Identity login and displays a branded welcome card with feature highlights.
frontend/src/components/LogoShowcase.tsx: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Marketplace page showing posts with filtering, sorting, tabs, and a modal to create new posts using data from useGetAllMarketplacePosts.
Card component rendering a marketplace post with author info, category, timestamp, and actions such as save and message.
frontend/src/components/Messages.tsx: Messaging interface listing followed users, allowing selecting a conversation target and sending messages via useSendMessage.
frontend/src/components/ModerationWarnin: Small alert banner reminding users to keep content positive, styled with warning visuals.
frontend/src/components/NotificationsPan: Modal listing notifications with timestamps and a button to mark each as read using useMarkNotificationRead.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Renders a detailed post card with author info, category badges, timestamps, moderation banner, and reaction buttons. Fetches profile data and manages profile modal state.
frontend/src/components/Profile.tsx: Displays the logged-in user's profile, posts, albums, notifications, and allows updating profile and images. Manages modal visibility and session activity tracking.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile setup including name, bio, and optional profile picture upload. Saves the profile and blocks closing until completion.
Provides spark, inspire, share, and comment actions for a post with animations and toast feedback. Handles like mutation and comment section toggling.
frontend/src/components/SafeImageIcon.ts: Image component that falls back to an icon and optional text when the image fails to load. Tracks load errors with internal state.
frontend/src/components/Search.tsx: Search bar component with input and submit button that triggers a callback with the entered term. Includes styling and icon integration.
frontend/src/components/SearchWithSi.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ServiceStatusChe: Checks backend health via an admin-only API and displays operational status with icons and badges. Handles loading, success, and error states with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/SiAssistant.tsx: Empty file with no implemented component.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonBlog.tsx: Renders a skeleton placeholder for a blog card with avatar, text lines, images, and footer buttons.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonMarketpl: Displays a detailed skeleton loader for a marketplace item card with header, content blocks, image, and footer buttons.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonPost.tsx: Shows a skeleton placeholder for a post with user info, text lines, an image area, and action buttons.
frontend/src/components/Space.tsx: Static page presenting information cards about a space-themed environment and customization options.
frontend/src/components/SpaceStarfield.t: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/SpaceThemeSettin: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StarEffectLogo.t: Canvas-based animated star effect around an image logo using rotating, twinkling particle rendering.
frontend/src/components/StarlightBackgro: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/StartLiveModal.t: Modal for starting and ending live video sessions, managing camera/audio streams, and showing live UI state.
frontend/src/components/StartupRecoveryS: Displays a recovery screen for clearing cache and handling startup issues with user guidance.
frontend/src/components/StorageCleanup.t: Provides UI for storage health checks and deep cleanup operations with progress and result handling.
frontend/src/components/TalkToMeBar.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/TopLevelErrorBou: Error boundary component showing a fallback UI and reload option when an unhandled error occurs.
Displays trending hashtags and top users by analyzing all posts, computing hashtag frequency and user post counts.
frontend/src/components/UpdateAvailableB: Shows a banner when a new app version is available, handling update attempts and fallback cache‑clearing recovery.
frontend/src/components/UpdateStatusModa: Modal for editing user status text, uploading images and music, and saving updates to the user profile.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileModal: Displays a user's profile, posts, and basic stats with follow button placeholder logic and profile modal layout.
frontend/src/components/VideoModeReel.ts: Full-screen vertical scrolling video viewer that snaps between posts and auto‑activates the current video.
frontend/src/components/VideoReelCard.ts: Renders an individual post's video with play, mute, author info, and timestamp logic, supporting video‑mode auto‑play.
frontend/src/components/WeatherBackgroun: Renders a canvas‑based animated weather background with particles and dynamic gradients based on weather and time of day.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: Provides a language context with translation dictionaries and helpers for switching and retrieving localized strings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useHorizontalWheelScr: Converts vertical mouse wheel movement into horizontal scrolling for a given element when appropriate.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, loading stored identities and providing login and logout helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines data‑fetching and mutation hooks for profiles, albums, status updates, and music attachments using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerUpdat: Detects service worker updates, handles stale cache checks, and provides a method to activate waiting workers with reload guarding.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpaceTheme.ts: Placeholder file; currently contains no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeather.ts: Custom hook that fetches geolocation-based weather data from OpenMeteo, maps weather codes, and updates day/night state with fallbacks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and a full OKLCH color system with light/dark mode variables, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Entry point that mounts the app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/utils/swRecovery.ts: Provides utilities to clear caches, unregister service workers, manage recovery cooldowns, and trigger full SW recovery.
frontend/src/utils/swReloadGuard.ts: Implements session-based counters to limit and block excessive service-worker-triggered reloads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from query strings and hash routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config that enables dark mode, loads plugins, and maps CSS variables to theme colors, radii, and shadows.
project_state.json: Stores the current project state with focus on restoring missing icons, building a unified scrollable hub screen, and improving video-mode transitions. Includes existing features, new feature requests, known issues, and project metadata.
